Detailed Description

Vertex-based light class.

Provides an interface to opengl vertex lighting. This is not the perferred method of lighting in phoenix or 2d graphics, it's highly suggested that you use phoenix::PhLight instead. This class is here for completeness and for 3d functionality.

See also:
phoenix::PhVertexLightSystem, phoenix::PhLight

Constructor.

Creates a new light and binds it to the lighting system.

Parameters:
l A pointer to the light system (usually obtained from the render system).
Position Position of the light.
c Color of the light.
